translation.main-subtitle: Ọna iṣakoso tita lori ọpọlọpọ awọn ibaraẹnisọrọ
translation.intro-text: Ohun elo DA ServePro ṣe iranlọwọ fun awọn oniṣọ ati awọn oṣiṣẹ lati tọpa awọn iṣẹ tita ni ọna ti o wulo. Yẹ fun F&B, tita ati awọn iṣẹ.
translation.feature2-text: Ṣiṣe akoso gangan lori gbogbo ẹrọ
translation.feature3-text: Akopọ aifọwọyi ti owo wọle, awọn ibere ati awọn nkan tita julọ
translation.feature4-text: Ṣeto awọn ipa ati awọn iyọnda pataki fun oṣiṣẹ kọọkan
translation.feature5-text: Awọn data ti wa ni isiro ati ipamọ ni aabo
translation.feature6-text: 2-layer iṣako, olumulo nikan ni o ni anfani
translation.address: Adirẹsi: 52 D1 Street, Phuoc Long B, Thu Duc, Ho Chi Minh City
translation.footer-text: © 2025 DA ServePro. Gbogbo ẹtọ wa ni ipamọ
